column1: ICYMI: My @CBSSunday interview on legislation I'm leading for working moms.  Our message is clear: women should be treated fairly at work - including those who are pregnant and breastfeeding.  Watch ⬇️ https://t.co/vOxXpEHKV1

I’ve listened to our sportsmen recreational and commercial fishermen tribes and coastal communities and will continue fighting to preserve and bolster our native fish populations and hatchery production. https://t.co/yVyVH21OVI
I've got a quick positive update for working moms in Southwest Washington ⬇️ https://t.co/iSY0CbWV1W

...which will celebrate blood stem cell donors as life-saving heroes & help remove barriers to successful transplants for patients.   This is vitally important to folks in Southwest Washington & all across the country & I’m glad to see it come to fruition.

What an exciting time for @BeTheMatchNW as they open its first registry-operated blood stem cell collection facility in Seattle this week!   From my position on the House Appropriations Committee I was proud to support the National Marrow Donor Program/Be the Match...

→ Increasing salmon habitat & hatchery production → Supporting passage of the USMCA → Addressing the opioid crisis ... & more in my recent newsletter: https://t.co/2jPNlsrcdb Sign up for updates here: https://t.co/lUUnNJz1QM https://t.co/RG7NhYuQ1t

I’m a mom who’s had kids since working in this job and I understand how important it is to treat women fairly who want to raise a family and continue working.   This bill will help prevent problems before they start benefiting both moms and employers.

I had the opportunity to sit down with @CBSSunday to discuss the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act - a bill I introduced with @RepBonamici to ensure women are treated fairly at work - including those who are pregnant & breastfeeding.  Watch ⬇️ https://t.co/nGFsD9wHgl

Preserving our dams – and the clean affordable hydropower they provide – is vital to Southwest Washington communities.  Please see this study about some of the costs (in dollars and lost economic activity). ⬇️ https://t.co/Q41zn7sZjZ
(3/3) Given the current state of deescalation there is no need for us to now embolden Iran by holding a public show of division within our government.
(2/3) I would have expected any commander in chief regardless of party to take this strategic opportunity to rid the world of one of its most deadly terrorists.

(1/3) I voted against today’s War Powers Resolution. Qasem Soleimani was responsible for providing improvised explosive devices to our enemies to kill and maim over 600 American servicemembers – leaving more Gold Star families to mourn their sons and daughters.

Libraries are not only important to our children’s reading & development but also greatly enrich our communities - I love visiting our SW WA libraries with my kiddos to pick out books to read! 📚📖 https://t.co/jJ8QJScXhv

On this #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay I want to thank every man & woman who have devoted their lives to keeping our communities safe here in Southwest Washington.   We are forever grateful for your service. https://t.co/yTr1SszXZc

If disaster strikes fishing businesses in Pacific County I want to make sure relief is going to those who need it as quickly as possible. That’s why I’m introducing this bipartisan bill with @RepDerekKilmer to help protect our fishing communities. https://t.co/XIezWeDHqQ

Proud to help lead this bill with you @RepRonKind! This bipartisan bill ensures individuals who underwent a kidney transplant will have coverage and access to drugs working to prevent rejection on the donated organ regardless of their insurance status. https://t.co/mo9rCTxTWy
I’m pleased to have supported another common-sense solution that eases the financial burden working families face in Ridgefield Centralia Bingen and all across our region. ⬇️https://t.co/sOILfdts8b

Families in Southwest Washington who are struggling to afford housing child care and medical expenses should be able to access their own savings when they need it most – often that’s the year following the birth or adoption of a child.

Fantastic news in the fight to protect our salmon and steelhead runs!   With my sea lion control bill being signed into law experts believe we'll see similar results for native runs in the Columbia River. https://t.co/hXu6W2Kzl2
Happy New Year Southwest Washington! 🎉  Wishing you and your loved ones a wonderful healthy and blessed 2020.
Looking back at 2019 . . .  It's an honor to serve you in Congress! https://t.co/lwDiXx3BWU
Love this idea of showcasing Southwest Washington’s own Mount St. Helens! https://t.co/iYMJHB9bIj

Working parents in Southwest Washington shouldn't be forced to choose between spending time with their new child and being able to pay their bills. That's why I'm proud to help lead this bill ⬇️ https://t.co/3z3ia9s7E3
From our family to yours Merry Christmas! 🎄 https://t.co/50N8pzPndJ
Great news for coastal fishermen!  Proud to support this legislation for groundfish trawlers that provide jobs all along our coast. ⬇️ https://t.co/T1K3KaSibk

Congrats to Gomar Sparhawk of @HudsonsBayHS on placing 1st in this year's @CongressionalAC! Thanks to every student who designed & coded their original apps - I hope this inspires you to continue on in the area of STEM.  Watch Gomar's app design here: https://t.co/Xc0HorxovR https://t.co/JlkheNv24w

Southwest WA seniors & families need reliable electricity to help keep them safe in the event of a natural disaster. I’m pleased to introduce this bipartisan bill to improve the reliability of our electric grid and emergency response time.   Read more ⬇️ https://t.co/CFeAAMvPcU

More than half of all Americans know someone affected by the opioid crisis.   Our families neighbors and friends are facing this struggle right here in Southwest Washington.   Together we can help end the stigma of addiction by sharing our stories. #StopOpioidSilence https://t.co/RjQughjuoM
Securing critical salmon habitat and hatchery funding 🐟  Read more ➡️ https://t.co/nxLLYDfJJO https://t.co/GBAUOmU5RY
Proud to support the passage of the USMCA in the U.S. House today.  Read my full statement ⬇️ https://t.co/jgxJnTSIul

We have to lower the cost of prescription drugs - especially for our seniors in Southwest Washington.  I’m proud to be taking steps in Congress so folks won’t have to choose between filling their prescriptions or foregoing medications. https://t.co/UICsEBXRVC

A big thanks to our two interns Dylan & Ronnie for their hard work serving the people of SW WA! I hope you both learned a little & had a lot of fun during your time in DC.   Good luck to both of you as you continue on with your education - you have bright futures ahead of you! https://t.co/GOlBYLL02G
https://t.co/70jlKcRUVX

As part of a bill to raise pay for our troops my legislation – the Reserve Medical Office Parity Act – was just approved by the House.   My bill will help provide health services to troops by increasing the number of available doctors & surgeons ⬇️ https://t.co/P9OQ4D87yy

The WSU Cosmic Crisp apple makes its way to DC! 🍎   It was great to sit down with the dean of @wsucahnrs André-Denis Wright & Director of WA St. Dept. of Ag. Derek Sandison to discuss WSU’s fruit breeding program that produced this new variety of apple - it’s delicious! https://t.co/40OSuwTKp8

I helped introduce the Lower Costs More Cures Act to lower drug prices for seniors.   Here's how it works: ✅ lowers drug prices ✅ increases cost transparency ✅ makes insulin more affordable  ➡️ https://t.co/iECooNAKGg https://t.co/Aqx0tAMdtE

Great read on why it’s critical we expand medical care to moms living in rural areas like Onalaska Carson & Raymond and why we must continue to fight the growing maternal mortality rate. ⬇️ https://t.co/iTGSGAyO7K

I also want to shoutout two SW WA schools who competed against each other in the Class 2B state football championship with the Onalaska Loggers coming out on top of the Kalama Chinooks - congrats to both teams on your tremendous seasons!

A big congratulations goes to the Camas Papermakers on ending their amazing football season with a state championship - and an undefeated season! 💪🏼🏈  You all make your community families & everyone here in Southwest Washington proud!
Today we pause to reflect on the attack on Pearl Harbor 78 years ago.   May we never forget to honor and remember all the Americans who lost their lives on that fateful day. https://t.co/soaUHImLhV
@WSUCougars @WSUCougarSoccer #WCollegeCup #GoCougs! https://t.co/Qn4EtwLj9z

Thanks for having me! Proud to support our businesses in Southwest Washington that provide good jobs to thousands of folks. https://t.co/8CrwLxECOU

Working moms & dads need to be able to spend critical time with their new infant or bonding with their adopted child & still pay their bills.  I'm pleased to help introduce a bipartisan solution to provide financial relief for new parents.  Read more ➡️ https://t.co/urW2jBVpeY https://t.co/eg5v91eylb

Today I proudly supported the TRACED Act - an important step to tackle often-predatory robocalls.   It’s time to put folks in Southwest Washington back in charge of their cell phones.   Next stop: the president’s desk!
Two bipartisan bills I’m supporting to combat maternal mortality right here in Southwest Washington are gaining traction in Congress.   Read more ⬇️ https://t.co/3VDbjawMmE

On this Thanksgiving day I’m so grateful and thankful for the opportunity to serve the amazing residents of Southwest Washington.   From our family to yours Happy Thanksgiving! 🦃🍂 https://t.co/BD6kyd7a0J

Proud to help lead the charge in Congress by supporting the Improving HOPE for Alzheimer’s and the Younger Onset Alzheimer’s Act.   These two important bills are a step in the right direction to help cure this cruel and heartbreaking disease. https://t.co/xf52USdh3z

Transit is a lifeline for residents in Longview & Kelso.   I was very pleased to support a $1.5 million grant to Longview RiverCities Transit so folks who are trying to get to school work and doctor’s appointments will have upgraded and reliable buses. ⬇️ https://t.co/MufDwImi0t

Celebrating #RuralHealthDay by being a cosponsor of legislation like the Rural Health Clinic Modernization Act which improves health care & services to Rural Health Clinics so folks in Morton Bingen and other small towns in SW WA have access to high quality health care. https://t.co/Wncuc29Mf0

Two bills I'm supporting the Maternal Health Quality Improvement Act & the Helping MOMS Act passed through @HouseCommerce this week!   Read how these bipartisan bills are addressing issues like telehealth & reducing maternal mortality for minority women⬇️https://t.co/juITumyoE0

After receiving a request from Naselle-Grays River Valley School District about securing books from the @librarycongress Surplus Books Program I was honored to select a few special books and bring them all the way from DC to Naselle.   Thanks for having me & enjoy the books! 📚 https://t.co/savTXM9gMH

I'm proud to be leading the Helping MOMS Act - a major congressional action to combat the maternal mortality crisis.  We need to ensure women's access to life-saving treatment isn't abruptly cut off post-pregnancy & that's exactly what this bill will do. https://t.co/K5CPh6dt9M

➡️ Honoring veterans ➡️ Introducing bipartisan legislation ➡️ Standing up for Pacific & Wahkiakum Counties ... & more in my recent newsletter here: https://t.co/nJs904lAxm Want regular updates? ➡️ https://t.co/ffyEpQ9bVY https://t.co/g9zTEHPqQd

Thanks for sharing valuable insight as we work to keep women in WA safe during pregnancy childbirth & postpartum https://t.co/FfJrwwDLh1

My amendment ensures the Rural STEM Education Act highlights the importance of computer science in PreK – 12th grade education. Computer and coding-related skills are just as vital to students in rural areas so that they can succeed in the ever-changing workplace. (2/2)
This week I successfully amended a solution to increase STEM education in rural communities – and we have plenty of those here in Southwest Washington. (1/2) https://t.co/VLJ7tD01o3
I pledge to stand with Israel as it defends itself against the barrage of nearly 200 rockets from Gaza headed toward civilians.
Reminder: I'm hosting a live teletown hall TONIGHT at 5:25pm PST  Call: 1-877-229-8493 Passcode: 116365  I look forward to talking to you!

¡Buenos días! Thank you @TweetHCN for the opportunity to share my work to improve life for the amazing Hispanic families I serve in SW WA. The stories and reflections from service many shared during conversations that day will remain with me. It was humbling and I'm grateful to each of you. (2/2) https://t.co/oYTcvKGQUJ

I am hosting a live telephone town hall this Thursday November 14th at 5:25 PM.   You can join the event at any time by calling 1-877-229-8493 and using the passcode 116365.   I look forward to hearing from you!

We cannot allow Oregon to toll on I-5 and I-205 without providing any benefit to Washington residents. I sent a letter today to Governor Inslee urging him to follow up on his statement that Oregon’s unfair tolling scheme “will not happen.”   Full letter → https://t.co/Dvndt9WDxp

Pleased to hear @NOAA awarded $18.6 million to Washington state's Pacific Coast Salmon Recovery Fund - this represents a significant portion of the critical program that I've worked so hard to strengthen in Congress. This is welcome news for our salmon recovery efforts.
